text: The 1990 Challenge Cup was the 89th staging of rugby league's oldest knockout competition, the Challenge Cup. Known as the Silk Cut Challenge Cup for sponsorship reasons, the final was contested by Wigan and Warrington at Wembley. Wigan won the match 36–14. ==Preliminary Round== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=150| Date !width=250| Team One !width=250| Team Two !width=100| Score |- |14 Jan ||Fulham ||
